CONSEJO_1: Organize your time with a calendar to avoid stress during exams.
CONSEJO_2: Take quality notes, use highlighters and concept maps to study better.
CONSEJO_3: Develop the habit of reading, it will help you improve comprehension and analysis.
CONSEJO_4: Use study techniques like the Pomodoro rule to make better use of your time.
CONSEJO_5: Take active breaks during your study sessions to maintain concentration.
CONSEJO_6: Practice breathing exercises to reduce stress before exams.
CONSEJO_7: Join study groups to share knowledge and resolve doubts.
CONSEJO_8: Keep your study space tidy and free of distractions.
CONSEJO_9: Set daily goals to maintain motivation and focus.
CONSEJO_10: Get enough sleep to improve your academic performance.
SENSOR_DESCONECTADO: The sensor is disconnected or has stopped working, please check the connection or replace it.
PROBLEMA_1_TITULO: I can't connect to the server
PROBLEMA_1_SOLUCION: Check that your Internet connection is working properly. If you're on Wi-Fi, try restarting the router. If you're on mobile data, ensure you have coverage and sufficient balance. Also, check if the server isn't under maintenance or offline.
PROBLEMA_2_TITULO: The system doesn't respond or freezes
PROBLEMA_2_SOLUCION: Close the app completely and reopen it. If the problem persists, try restarting your device. Ensure the app is updated to the latest version available in the app store. Also, check if other users are experiencing the same issue, as it might be a general system failure.
PROBLEMA_3_SOLUCION: Ensure the entered data is correct and meets the system's requirements. Check if any required fields are missing. If the problem persists, try logging out and back in. You can also try on another device or browser.
PROBLEMA_4_SOLUCION: Verify that notifications are enabled in the app and operating system settings. On Android devices, check that the app has permission to send notifications. On iOS, ensure 'Do Not Disturb' isn't activated.
PROBLEMA_5_SOLUCION: Use the 'Forgot your password?' option on the login screen. Enter your registered email and follow the instructions sent to your inbox. If you don't receive the email, check the spam folder or try again after a few minutes.
PROBLEMA_6_SOLUCION: Check if you have enough storage space on your device. It may also help to uninstall and reinstall the app. If the problem occurs after an update, check if there's a patch available or wait for a new version with fixes.
PROBLEMA_7_SOLUCION: Try clearing your browser's cache and cookies. If the problem continues, try opening the site in another browser or device. Also, check if there are network issues or if the server is under maintenance.
PROBLEMA_8_SOLUCION: Ensure you have a stable Internet connection. In some cases, the information may take a few minutes to update due to synchronization with the server. You can also try closing and reopening the app.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Integrated security system for educational environments
SISTEMA_PROTOTIPO: Prototype system for early detection of emergencies using IoT sensors and renewable energy.
APLICACION_HIBRIDA_DESCRIPCION: Real-time monitoring and control of lights/elevators
